title: Always with the Old Attack - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Ancient Times   Apocalypse   Appearance Changes   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Episodic   Farming   Handsome Male Lead   H*ndjob   Hypnotism   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Medical Knowledge   Modern Day   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Prison   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Showbiz   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   Zombies

description:
Because of boredom, Xu Jinyi entered a game. In this game called 'Different Worlds', he needed to play some cannon fodder or villain to live a happy new life.

Xu Jinyi worked hard to finish the game, and finally realized that this game was actually a scam created by Zhao Chengli specifically for him.>
